availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Walter M. Prentice (Cuyahoga County, Ohio, physician and soldier)

body.p: Cuyahoga County, Ohio physician and soldier. Ohio native. Married to Sarah Prentice. Father of Frank Prentice. Physician in Canfield, Mahoning County, Ohio in 1850. Physician in Cuyahoga County, Ohio in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Mahoning County, Canfield, p. 493A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Cuyahoga County, Cleveland Ward 9, p. 13 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, "Walter Mead Prentice (1824-May 28, 1864)," Memorial #6826810, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6826810 (accessed June 27, 2020).
